alert.note: Alert for Crowley; Otero (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 27 at 10:02PM MDT until August 27 at 10:15PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1015 PM MDT FOR CENTRAL OTERO AND SOUTHEASTERN CROWLEY COUNTIES... At 1002 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Sugar City to near La Junta to Timpas, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... La Junta, North La Junta, Rocky Ford, Ordway, Swink, Sugar City, Cheraw and Timpas. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
